data.title: The BEST episodes of Spider-Man Unlimited
data.meta_description: Every episode of Spider-Man Unlimited ever, ranked from best to worst by thousands of votes from fans of the show. The best episodes of Spider-Man Unlimited!
data.text:
# 6 - Sins of the Fathers

Season 1 - Episode 12 - Aired 3/24/2001

While visiting the grave of her parents, Karen is captured by the beastials. Spidey and X-51 go to rescue her, but much to their surprise, they find her well treated...courtesy of the High Evolutionary.

Directors: Patrick Archibald

Watch Now:AmazonApple TV

# 7 - Deadly Choices

Season 1 - Episode 4 - Aired 12/23/2000

A resistance member steals a sample of one of Sir Ram's experiments, not knowing that it contains a nuclear charge, triggered to explode shortly after the container is removed from the lab. With a lot of ground to cover, the resistance and the knights are left no choice other to cooperate in order to find him before the city is blown to pieces.

Writer: Steve Perry

Watch Now:AmazonApple TV

# 10 - Worlds Apart (1)

Season 1 - Episode 1 - Aired 10/2/1999

After the discovery of Counter-Earth--a very Earth like planet in the same orbit on the opposite side of the sun--John Jameson is sent on the first manned mission to it. But while covering the launch, Peter sees Venom and Carnage enter the shuttle. He tries to stop them, but he fails and ends up taking the blame for the assumed loss of the shuttle and gets a bounty on his head. When a plea for help from a John Jameson on Counter-Earth is received, Peter sees the only way to clear Spider-Man's name as hijacking a new shuttle and go to Counter-Earth himself.

Directors: Patrick Archibald

Watch Now:AmazonApple TV

# 13 - Sustenance

Season 1 - Episode 9 - Aired 3/3/2001

With the location of his shuttle, Peter decides it's time to go home. Just the right time too. as the Goblin is determined to help him pack.

Directors: Patrick Archibald

Watch Now:AmazonApple TV
